Title: An Act Converting the Present Parang Municipal High School in the Municipality of Parang, Province of Maguindanao, into a National High School
Data:
BATAS PAMBANSA Blg. 456
An Act Converting the Present Parang Municipal High School in the Municipality of Parang, Province of Maguindanao, into a National High School
Section 1. The present Parang Municipal High School in the Municipality of Parang, Province of Maguindanao, is hereby converted into a national high school to be known as Parang National High School.
Section 2. The institution shall offer such courses as may be necessary for the vocational upliftment of the student, in addition to courses being presently offered therein.1a\^/phi1
Section 3. The Minister of Education, Culture and Sports is hereby empowered to issue such rules and regulations as may be necessary to carry out the purposes of this Act.
Section 4. The amount of one hundred thousand pesos for the operation of the school shall be funded out of the appropriations authorized by Batas Pambansa Blg. 230 for the Ministry of Education, Culture and Sports intended for new national high schools and an additional amount corresponding to fifty percent of its share in the budgetary aid actually paid to it before such conversion shall be released for its operation from the national assistance fund to local schools. Thereafter, such sum as may be necessary for its operation and maintenance shall be included in the annual General Appropriations Act.
Section 5. All buildings, equipment, or any property of the Parang Municipal High School as well as the administration staff and faculty members thereof, shall be absorbed by the new institution, the Parang National High School.
Section 6. All laws, orders and regulations, or parts thereof inconsistent with this Act are hereby modified or repealed accordingly.
Section 7. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.
Approved: June 10, 1983
